Object Shape: Blimp, Cylinder, Fireball, Oval, Sphere, Unknown
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving down the street with my friend, we both noticed these weird lights in the sky, we noticed there were actually 3 flying in a triangle formation, varying distances with eachother as they flew. i thought maybe they were flying lanters or something because of the flame lol on the inside but there were only 3 staying in that triangle. we turned around to go home & we could still kind of see them driving the opposite way when we noticed a couple at the side of the road notice them as well, probably a block later we looked back & we could no longer see them. (photo's only slightly enhanced on iphone 4 edit option for easier viewing) also on instagram, i looked under the #ufo & found someone else from i don't know where posted a photo of 3 lights in the sky only about half an hour after i did!
Summary: 3 small flying objects, varying in a triangle formation
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Fort Erie
There were no other sightings in Fort Erie on or around May 18th 2013
